name: 15 Seconds (itch)
description:
This game consists of an experimental prototype for a short game.

Goal: Escape the maze

Controls:

* WASD to move.

* Run into an enemy to steal their body.

* Press Escape to quit the game.

This game was made for a class at the University of Utah known as "Experimental Gameplay", which challenges students to make short games with unique mechanics using a gamejam-like format. The prompt for this game was "15 Seconds".
